products.name: x REVOLVE Tuscany Dress
products.brandedName: SNDYS x REVOLVE Tuscany Dress
products.description: x REVOLVE Tuscany Dress x REVOLVE Tuscany Dress 100% cotton. Made in China. Machine wash. Fully lined. Hidden zipper closure. SDYS-WD230. SED345. We want women to feel like they don't need permission to showcase their own style. For us, it's always going to be about promoting creativity without contingencies. Directors Melanie Purcell and Lauren Gocher named SNDYS after their favorite day of the week, Sunday, where they would spend time with family and discover new creative outlets. SNDYS offers cutting edge and affordable styles that not only follow trends, but start them. Based out of Sydney, Australia, SNDYS is bold and unabashedly feminine. Expect matching lounge sets, floral maxi dresses, and timeless outerwear.

products.name: Pleated embroidered duchesse-satin gown
products.brandedName: Marchesa Notte Pleated embroidered duchesse-satin gown
products.description: Gown floral-design duchesse-satin pleated two side slit pockets concealed hook and zip fastening at back internal boning fully lined mid-weight, non-stretchy fabric dry clean imported Captivating gowns are a Marchesa Notte specialty, so it comes as no surprise that this off-the-shoulder design is one of the brand’s own. Cut from black duchesse-satin, it’s adorned with an artful floral design from the illusion wrap bodice to the floor-sweeping hem. The romantic neckline is mirrored a the back – get the full effect with upswept hair.

products.name: Pleated duchesse-satin gown
products.brandedName: Marchesa Notte Pleated duchesse-satin gown
products.description: Gown duchesse-satin pleated two side slit pockets concealed hook and zip fastening at back internal boning fully lined mid-weight, non-stretchy fabric dry clean imported Suited for the most formal affairs, Marchesa Notte’s gown is crafted from duchesse-satin with a luxurious sheen. The dramatic off-the-shoulder neckline is accentuated by a delicately pleated panel that crosses over the bodice, meeting the full skirt. Complement the deep navy color with silver or gold jewelry.

products.name: Embroidered tulle and charmeuse gown
products.brandedName: Marchesa Notte Embroidered tulle and charmeuse gown
products.description: Gown floral-print tulle charmeuse paneled embroidered adjustable straps concealed hook and zip fastening at back fully lined mid-weight, non-stretchy fabric dry clean imported This Marchesa Notte gown is a midsummer dream. Crafted from panels of navy tulle and charmeuse, blooming bouquets cascade down to the floor-grazing hem. Soft pleats below the plunging neckline create an elegant drape across the front, making it the perfect dress for sunset ceremonies, garden parties and more.

products.name: Cape-effect metallic voile gown
products.brandedName: Talbot Runhof Cape-effect metallic voile gown
products.description: This extraordinary design pairs best with minimalist accessories for black tie events gown metallic voile cape-effect draped concealed hook and zip fastening along back fully lined lightweight, non-stretchy fabric dry clean made in germany Talbot Runhof's voile gown is decorated with shimmering metallic threads that create a mesmerizing leopard-print design. Cut to skim your figure, it's softly draped throughout and has a floor-grazing cape that follows you beautifully as you walk. Keep accessories and makeup minimal.

products.name: Brocade midi dress
products.brandedName: Marchesa Notte Brocade midi dress
products.description: Dress floral-design brocade pleated puffed sleeves two side slit pockets concealed hook and zip fastening at back fully lined mid-weight, non-stretchy fabric dry clean imported Feminine silhouettes with glamourous details are a Marchesa Notte signature, as seen on this gorgeous midi dress. Crafted from elegant brocade, puffed sleeves enhance the fitted bodice, while vibrant bouquets sprawl down to a full skirt that flounces with every step. Wear yours with strappy sandals and gold-tone jewelry.

products.name: Lette asymmetric printed silk-twill maxi dress

products.unbrandedName: Lette asymmetric printed silk-twill maxi dress
products.description: Dress printed silk-twill asymmetric hem hook-fastening keyhole at back mid-weight, non-stretchy fabric specialist clean or dry clean imported Roksanda Ilinčić's connection to the art world informs most of her designs, like her references to the work of Japanese artist Atsuko Tanaka. This 'Lette' dress is cut from silk-twill and printed with an artful trompe l'oeil effect, the pink ribbons complement the cobalt and burgundy tones beautifully. Complement the handkerchief hem with heels.

products.unbrandedName: Drusa one-shoulder draped floral-jacquard midi dress
products.description: One-shoulder dress floral-jacquard draped panel back split concealed hook and zip fastening at side fully lined mid-weight, non-stretchy fabric dry clean Markarian's New York-made draped jacquard 'Drusa' dress is a testament to the brand's dedication to craftsmanship. It's woven with a floral pattern from shimmering yarns for a touch of sparkle. The sweeping one-shoulder neckline is mirrored across the back, drawing the eye to the elegant fold-over train.

products.name: Embellished crepe gown
products.brandedName: Reem Acra Embellished crepe gown
products.description: Catch eyes all night in this intricately embellished floor-sweeping design gown crepe crystals ruffled sleeves side splits concealed hook and zip fastening at back lightweight, slightly stretchy fabric dry clean imported Reem Acra's gown is timelessly elegant, so you'll always look back at photos of your event with confidence in your choice of outfit. It's cut from fluid red crepe in a loose, kaftan-inspired design with cascading ruffles along the sleeves and has light-catching crystals decorating the neckline, they add glamour while replacing the need for jewelry.

products.name: Strapless brocade gown
products.brandedName: Marchesa Notte Strapless brocade gown
products.description: Gown floral-design brocade two side slit pockets front split concealed hook and zip fastening at back internal boning fully lined mid-weight, non-stretchy fabric dry clean imported Marchesa Notte brings the glamour and elegance to any formal occasion with this strapless gown. Crafted from lustrous brocade decorated with delicate flowers and vines, it features internal boning for structure and a front split so you can walk gracefully around the room. Highlight the neckline by keeping your décolletage bare.

products.name: Feather-embellished silk-organza gown

It's made from silk-organza to hold the shape of the voluminous skirt and comes with a grosgrain belt, which can be tied at the front or back.

products.name: One-shoulder asymmetric embellished tulle gown
products.brandedName: Reem Acra One-shoulder asymmetric embellished tulle gown
products.description: This extraordinary design pairs best with minimalist accessories for black tie events gown tulle sequins asymmetric hem concealed hook and zip fastening at side fully lined weighted, heavily embellished fabric dry clean Reem Acra's gown is covered in an array of beads, sequins and crystals that catch the light from all angles, wear it to a highly photographed event or one where you're in the spotlight, so you can see it sparkle to its full potential. Made from swathes of tulle, it has a one-shoulder neckline and asymmetric hem that partially pools at the floor. Keep accessories minimal.

products.name: Astaire off-the-shoulder metallic brocade gown
products.brandedName: MARKARIAN Astaire off-the-shoulder metallic brocade gown
products.description: Designed to frame your décolletage, wear yours with swept-up hair and statement earrings gown metallic floral-design brocade puffed sleeves elasticated cuffs train hem concealed hook and zip fastening along back fully lined internal bustier mid-weight, non-stretchy fabric dry clean Markarian's 'Astaire' gown is made from brocade woven with vibrant metallic hibiscus flowers that sparkle in the light. products.name: Ribbed High Neck Wool-Blend Tank
products.brandedName: Vince Ribbed High Neck Wool-Blend Tank
products.description: Introducing the Vince Ribbed High Neck Wool-Blend Tank, a timeless staple from the laid-back California-inspired brand, Vince. This high-neck tank is crafted with a blend of recycled nylon, viscose, wool, nylon, and spandex for a comfortable and stylish fit. The ribbed design adds texture and sophistication to this versatile piece. Hand washable and imported, this tank is perfect for layering or wearing on its own. Elevate your wardrobe with Vince's casual cool vibes and timeless simplicity.

products.name: Juno Leather Sandal
products.brandedName: Gianvito Rossi Juno Leather Sandal
products.description: Introducing the Gianvito Rossi Juno Leather Sandal, a chic and timeless addition to your summer wardrobe. Made in Italy with impeccable craftsmanship, these sandals feature knotted straps in black leather for a sophisticated look. The lightly padded leather insole ensures all-day comfort, while the smooth leather sole adds a touch of luxury to every step. Gianvito Rossi is known for effortlessly blending Italian chic with wearability, making these sandals a must-have for any fashion-forward woman. Please note that size selections are European, so be sure to reference the size chart for US conversions. Rest assured that our products are 100% genuine, as we stand by the authenticity of every item sold on our site. Elevate your style with the Gianvito Rossi Juno Leather Sandal.

products.name: Pleated Top, , - Grey
products.brandedName: Pleats Please Issey Miyake Pleated Top, , - Grey
products.description: Captivating in its subtlety, the PLEATED TOP from ISSEY MIYAKE PLEATS PLEASE epitomizes minimalist elegance. Presented in a sophisticated grey, this unique piece of clothing revitalizes the classic aesthetic with modern accents. Its distinctive, vertical pleats, crafted from the highest quality polyester, imbue the product with structural depth and dynamism, subtly sculpting the silhouette. Featuring short sleeves and a round neckline, the top ensures comfort while maintaining the utmost elegance. The elastic material it is made from guarantees a perfect fit to the body and comfort throughout the day. The uniqueness of this top is accentuated by the evenly distributed pleats, making the product not only visually appealing but also practical. A gently waving edge at the neckline adds charm, and the understated design without visible logos or branding underscores the exclusive nature of the Issey Miyake Pleats Please brand. Paired with pleated trousers, it creates a cohesive set that continuously exudes luxury and modernity. The simple cut at the back of the top ensures timeless classic and discreet elegance. WHY INVEST IN THIS PRODUCT? * Exclusive, minimalist design characteristic of the Issey Miyake Pleats Please brand. * High-quality material ensuring comfort and flexibility. * Pleats that sculpt the silhouette, adding elegance and dynamism. * Perfect fit thanks to the elastic material. * The opportunity to create a cohesive set with pleated trousers in the same color and pattern.
